"Pegasus Trial I":
"Yeah, you're doing a great job.
There is a favor I would like to ask of
you. Do you know about Riding Quests?
You use the Rideroid to subdue the
enemies within a limited time. I'd like you
to target the Las Vegas area and
complete these Riding Quests for me.

※Limited to Las Vegas Riding Quests
※Score is updated upon Quest Clear."
